mng: insect that eats into books, clothing etc, moth-eaten, worm-eaten

exm.mng: lit. a door hinge never becomes worm-eaten, constant activity prevents decay (idiom)
Flowing water does not rot, nor a door-hinge rust (idiom), constant activity prevents decay
exm.pyn: liú shuǐ bù fǔ , hù shū bù dù

exm.mng: bookworm (literal and figurative), book louse, pedant
